dc.title: Health Services/Technology Assessment Text (HSTAT)
dc.description: The Evidence-based Practice Centers develop evidence reports and technology assessments based on rigorous, comprehensive syntheses and analyses of relevant scientific literature, emphasizing explicit and detailed documentation of methods, rationale, and assumptions.
